title: Acquia Purge Enabled
name: Acquia:PurgeEnabled
description:
Acquia Purge modules allows updates in content to be reflected in page cache
in realtime on the Acquia Platform. It does this by administering bans to the
platform page caching service (Varnish).
failure: Acquia Purge module is not enabled.
remediation: Install and enable the Acquia Purge module into your codebase.
